snippet: The credit rating agency said in a note on Monday that it regarded the large compensation packages awarded to top executives as a potentially ominous event for bondholders.
abstract: The credit rating agency said in a note on Monday that it regarded the large compensation packages awarded to top executives as a potentially ominous event for bondholders.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies
